test.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser

kw.name: Open Thinx Homepage Using Chrome Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//header[@class='flex justify-between items-center px-3 h-[3.25rem] lg:h-14.5 lg:px-8 bg-white border-b border-b-brand-tangerine']//a[contains(.,'Sign in')]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element '//button[@class='relative mr-4 lg:mr-0 lg:ml-5 group']' is displayed.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
